modules.description: This module computes swhids for specific software heritage objects including content, directories, releases, revisions, and snapshots. It operates on raw file content, directory structures, version control metadata, and branch information. Concrete use cases include generating identifiers for version-controlled files, directories with recursive content, and structured release or snapshot references.

This module constructs download URLs for various object types stored in a Software Heritage archive instance. It supports content, directory, revision, release, and snapshot objects by converting their identifiers into downloadable URLs, handling both direct hash inputs and object identifiers. Use cases include retrieving source code artifacts, reconstructing software repositories, and accessing versioned software releases directly from the archive.

This module computes swhids for software heritage objects like content, directories, releases, revisions, and snapshots, using raw file data, directory trees, and version control metadata. It generates identifiers for version-controlled files, hierarchical directory structures, and release references. Additionally, it constructs download URLs from these identifiers, enabling direct access to source code artifacts and versioned software releases stored in a Software Heritage archive.
